title: Bronze 1 Supp looking for mature duo partner
body: Bronze 1 80lp last season, I main support (used to main jungle, so I can still play jungle) and am looking for a mature duo partner who wants to climb the ladder with me.  Would definitely help to have a mic and teamspeak/cursevoice/razercomms/mumble.

replies.body:
I can play supp and duo with you, have a few games see how we go at first?

IG: x1toak

Feel free to add me
I dont have a mic and im not in b1. I wouldnt mind a duo partner. Are you in B1 now after  promos?
